text:
Research and Markets
DUBLIN , Oct. 14, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --
Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/r28j5p/athletic_footwear ) has announced the addition of the "Athletic Footwear Market in the US 2015-2019" report to their offering.
Athletic Footwear Market in the US 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. It covers the Athletic Footwear market landscape in the US and its growth prospects in the coming years. The report also includes a discussion of the key vendors operating in this market.
Increased interest in athletic sports, surging demand for innovative footwear, increased awareness of healthy lifestyles, and increase in seasonal sales with sports events are the factors contributing to the growth of the Athletic Footwear market in the US.
Growing demand for innovative footwear is one of the key trends emerging in the market. Major vendors are launching innovative and customized footwear. For instance, Adidas launched its Energy Boost shoes in 2013, which carry a tiny melted energy capsule in their midsole. These shoes help athletes run for longer with less effort and without expending much energy.
According to the report, increased demand for comfortable footwear as a result of changes in lifestyle and consumer preference for comfort over price is propelling market growth. Hectic work schedules and the growing number of health-related issues are encouraging people to adopt daily exercise routines.
Further, the report states that one of the major challenges faced by this market is the rise in raw material costs. Vendors are witnessing a decline in their profit margins as a result of rising raw material prices, thus hindering market growth.
